ValidationRule.description: QTR YTD populated and QTR YTD included in the Not Applicable: Tax, Wage and Balance picklist
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: QTD_YTD_Data_Load_of_Wages__c && INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "QTD YTD Data Load of Wages")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** QTR YTD cannot be populated and included in the Not Applicable: Tax, Wage and Balance picklist ****
